official_title: A bill to provide that no officer or employee of the United States shall change the design of Federal reserve notes unless such change is specifically authorized by Federal law.

summary.text: Prohibits any officer or employee of the United States from changing the design of Federal Reserve notes unless such change is specifically authorized by law.

titles.title: A bill to provide that no officer or employee of the United States shall change the design of Federal reserve notes unless such change is specifically authorized by Federal law.
